title: When will the new water plant in Ogden service the Ogden area?
text: Hello. THe plant is coming on line over the next few weeks. Here's a link to our most recent article about it. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091029/ARTICLES/910299972/1015/NEWS0101?Title=Water-from-new-plant-uses-nano-filtration-technology
